subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Cornhusker quarterback Tommy Armstrong threw a 30-yard strike to Brandon Reilly with 17 seconds left, and the play stood after a video review to sink the No. 6 Spartans.
snippet: Cornhusker quarterback Tommy Armstrong threw a 30-yard strike to Brandon Reilly with 17 seconds left, and the play stood after a video review to sink the No. 6 Spartans.
